name: remains
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 pieces or parts of something that continue to exist when most of it has been used, destroyed, or taken away: The remains of lunch were still on the table. We visited the remains of a 12th century monastery. human/someone's remains formal
someone's dead body or the remaining parts of it: 50 years after he died, his remains were returned to his homeland. Human remains were found in the woods.
More examplesFewer examplesThe remains of the Roman fort are well preserved.Early human remains were found in the Dordogne region of France.Building at the site was halted after human remains were unearthed earlier this month.The remains of some Roman earthenware vessels were found during the dig.His remains can now be given a proper burial.
